articles.title: China vows ‘firm countermeasures’ to Trump tariffs; Asian markets fall - The Washington Post
articles.description: Allies and adversaries alike were reeling from Trump’s tariff blitz, with some signaling they were ready to retaliate while others were still hoping for talks.
